org.wicketstuff.security.checks

Class ContainerSecurityCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wicketstuff.security.checks.AbstractSecurityCheck
      • org.wicketstuff.security.checks.ComponentSecurityCheck
        • org.wicketstuff.security.checks.ContainerSecurityCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ISecurityCheck

    public class ContainerSecurityCheck
extends ComponentSecurityCheck
    Security check for when you replace panels on a page instead of using new pages. This is done by checking if the panel / container class is authorized just like it does with pages.
    Author:
    marrink
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContainerSecurityCheck

        public ContainerSecurityCheck(org.apache.wicket.MarkupContainer component)
        Constructs a new check on the container. By default neither the model or the authentication is checked.
        Parameters:
        component - the container

      • ContainerSecurityCheck

        public ContainerSecurityCheck(org.apache.wicket.MarkupContainer component,
                      boolean checkSecureModelIfExists)
        Constructs a new check on the container. By default authentication is not checked.
        Parameters:
        component - the container
        checkSecureModelIfExists - flag for enabling or disabling the securitycheck on the model

      • ContainerSecurityCheck

        public ContainerSecurityCheck(org.apache.wicket.MarkupContainer component,
                      boolean checkSecureModelIfExists,
                      boolean enableAuthenticationCheck)
        Constructs a new check on the container with the given flags for model and authentication checks.
        Parameters:
        component -
        checkSecureModelIfExists - flag for enabling or disabling the securitycheck on the model
        enableAuthenticationCheck - flag if authentication should be checked for this component

    • Method Detail

      • isActionAuthorized

        public boolean isActionAuthorized(WaspAction action)
        Checks the container class.
        Specified by:
        isActionAuthorized in interface ISecurityCheck
        Overrides:
        isActionAuthorized in class ComponentSecurityCheck
        Parameters:
        action - the action(s) like render or enable.
        Returns:
        true if the component (and optionally the model) are authorized, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ComponentSecurityCheck.isActionAuthorized(org.wicketstuff.security.actions.WaspAction)
